page.title: 09EDUCATION IN THORNTON
page.content: MY NAME IS{ ANDREW WEAVER};I AM AN ELEVEN YEAR OLD BOY.I WILL BE TWELVE ON THE 5TH OCTOBER 1985.I LIVE IN THORNTON WHICH IS JUST A FEW MILES INLAND OFF THE FYLDE COAST. EVERYDAY I RISE ABOUT 8:AM THEN GET WASHED AND DRESSED IN MY SCHOOL UNIFORM.THIS IS GREY LONG TROUSERS,BLUE SHIRT A STRIPED BLUE AND NAVY TIE AND A NAVY PULLOVER AND GREY SOCKS.SCHOOL STARTS AT 9:AM AND FINISHES AT 3:30PM WITH DINNER AT 12:00PM AND TWO OTHER BREAKS.WHEN I GET HOME I PLAY ON MY COMPUTER OR I SOMETIMES PLAY ON MY BIKE.ON TUESDAYS AND FRIDAYS I GO TO SEACADETS WHICH STARTS ABOUT 7:00PM AND FINISHES AT 9:30PM.THIS IS A TRAINING CORPS FOR YOUNG PEOPLE WHO ARE INTERESTED IN THE SEA,AND SOME GO ON TO JOIN THE NAVY WHEN THEY LEAVE SCHOOL.
